metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5662 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: x3270 before 3.3.12ga12 does not verify that the server hostname matches a domain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) or subjectAltName field of the X.509 certificate, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof SSL servers via an arbitrary valid certificate.

criterions.comment: ibm-3270 package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
